content: {"name": "Mt Pleasant Food Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Emergency boxes of free food are offered in Cabarrus NC from the pantry.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8615 Park Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Mount Pleasant", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28124", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4007366, "longitude": -80.4332823}, "phones": [{"number": "(980) 621-8634", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}]}
